channel.title: INfood
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfood, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ricotta Pie
item.description: This creamy Ricotta Pie has a milky cinnamon flavor with a hint of lemon. The flavor is incredible, and it’s…

item.title: Chocolate Tahini Caramels (No Candy Thermometer!)

item.title: Creamy Vegan White Bean Chili
item.description: We love a classic (tomato-based) chili, but a CREAMY chili? It’s hard to say no to! Mix up your chili rotation with this creamy vegan white bean chili...

item.title: Amish Breakfast Casserole

item.title: Easy Winter Fruit Salad (1 Bowl!)
item.description: Winter fruits are survivors , making it through the coldest days of the year. We had to show them some appreciation. Enter this simple, vibrant winter...

item.title: Spoon Bread

item.title: 1-Bowl Banana Chocolate Pecan Muffins (Vegan + GF)
